wide_pushout_exists_rep':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.wide_pushout_exists_rep' {B : C} {α : Type _} [nonempty α] {X : α → C} (f : ∀ j : α, «expr ⟶ » B (X j))
    [has_wide_pushout.{v} B X f] [preserves_colimit (wide_span B X f) (forget C)] (x : wide_pushout B X f) :
    ∃ (i : α)(y : X i), ι f i y = x :=
  by
  rcases concrete.wide_pushout_exists_rep f x with (⟨y, rfl⟩ | ⟨i, y, rfl⟩)
  · inhabit α
    use Inhabited.default _, f _ y
    simp only [← arrow_ι _ (Inhabited.default α), comp_apply]
  · use i, y
#align concrete.wide_pushout_exists_rep' concrete.wide_pushout_exists_rep'
wide_pushout_exists_rep:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.wide_pushout_exists_rep {B : C} {α : Type _} {X : α → C} (f : ∀ j : α, «expr ⟶ » B (X j))
    [has_wide_pushout.{v} B X f] [preserves_colimit (wide_span B X f) (forget C)] (x : wide_pushout B X f) :
    (∃ y : B, head f y = x) ∨ ∃ (i : α)(y : X i), ι f i y = x :=
  by
  obtain ⟨_ | j, y, rfl⟩ := concrete.colimit_exists_rep _ x
  · use y
  · right
    use j, y
#align concrete.wide_pushout_exists_rep concrete.wide_pushout_exists_rep
wide_pullback_ext':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.wide_pullback_ext' {B : C} {ι : Type w} [nonempty ι] {X : ι → C} (f : ∀ j : ι, «expr ⟶ » (X j) B)
    [has_wide_pullback.{w} B X f] [preserves_limit (wide_cospan B X f) (forget C)] (x y : wide_pullback B X f)
    (h : ∀ j, π f j x = π f j y) : x = y :=
  by
  apply concrete.wide_pullback_ext _ _ _ _ h
  inhabit ι
  simp only [← π_arrow f (Inhabited.default _), comp_apply, h]
#align concrete.wide_pullback_ext' concrete.wide_pullback_ext'
wide_pullback_ext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.wide_pullback_ext {B : C} {ι : Type w} {X : ι → C} (f : ∀ j : ι, «expr ⟶ » (X j) B)
    [has_wide_pullback B X f] [preserves_limit (wide_cospan B X f) (forget C)] (x y : wide_pullback B X f)
    (h₀ : base f x = base f y) (h : ∀ j, π f j x = π f j y) : x = y :=
  by
  apply concrete.limit_ext
  rintro (_ | j)
  · exact h₀
  · apply h
#align concrete.wide_pullback_ext concrete.wide_pullback_ext
to_product_injective_of_is_limit:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2017 Scott Morrison. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Scott Morrison, Adam Topaz
-/
theorem concrete.to_product_injective_of_is_limit {D : cone F} (hD : is_limit D) :
    function.injective fun (x : D.X) (j : J) => D.π.app j x :=
  by
  let E := (forget C).map_cone D
  let hE : is_limit E := is_limit_of_preserves _ hD
  let G := types.limit_cone.{w, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))
  let hG := types.limit_cone_is_limit.{w, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))
  let T : «expr ≅ » E.X G.X := hE.cone_point_unique_up_to_iso hG
  change function.injective («expr ≫ » T.hom fun x j => G.π.app j x)
  have h : function.injective T.hom := by
    intro a b h
    suffices T.inv (T.hom a) = T.inv (T.hom b) by simpa
    rw [h]
  suffices function.injective fun (x : G.X) j => G.π.app j x by exact this.comp h
  apply subtype.ext
#align concrete.to_product_injective_of_is_limit concrete.to_product_injective_of_is_limit
multiequalizer_ext:
theorem concrete.multiequalizer_ext {I : multicospan_index.{w} C} [has_multiequalizer I]
    [preserves_limit I.multicospan (forget C)] (x y : multiequalizer I)
    (h : ∀ t : I.L, multiequalizer.ι I t x = multiequalizer.ι I t y) : x = y :=
  by
  apply concrete.limit_ext
  rintro (a | b)
  · apply h
  · rw [← limit.w I.multicospan (walking_multicospan.hom.fst b), comp_apply, comp_apply, h]
#align concrete.multiequalizer_ext concrete.multiequalizer_ext
multiequalizer_equiv_apply:
@[simp]
theorem concrete.multiequalizer_equiv_apply (I : multicospan_index.{w} C) [has_multiequalizer I]
    [preserves_limit I.multicospan (forget C)] (x : multiequalizer I) (i : I.L) :
    ((concrete.multiequalizer_equiv I) x : ∀ i : I.L, I.left i) i = multiequalizer.ι I i x :=
  rfl
#align concrete.multiequalizer_equiv_apply concrete.multiequalizer_equiv_apply
limit_ext:
theorem concrete.limit_ext [has_limit F] (x y : limit F) : (∀ j, limit.π F j x = limit.π F j y) → x = y :=
  concrete.is_limit_ext F (limit.is_limit _) _ _
#align concrete.limit_ext concrete.limit_ext
is_limit_ext:
theorem concrete.is_limit_ext {D : cone F} (hD : is_limit D) (x y : D.X) : (∀ j, D.π.app j x = D.π.app j y) → x = y :=
  fun h => concrete.to_product_injective_of_is_limit _ hD (funext h)
#align concrete.is_limit_ext concrete.is_limit_ext
is_colimit_rep_eq_of_exists:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.is_colimit_rep_eq_of_exists {D : cocone F} {i j : J} (hD : is_colimit D) (x : F.obj i) (y : F.obj j)
    (h : ∃ (k : _)(f : «expr ⟶ » i k)(g : «expr ⟶ » j k), F.map f x = F.map g y) : D.ι.app i x = D.ι.app j y :=
  by
  let E := (forget C).map_cocone D
  let hE : is_colimit E := is_colimit_of_preserves _ hD
  let G := types.colimit_cocone.{v, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))
  let hG := types.colimit_cocone_is_colimit.{v, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))
  let T : «expr ≅ » E G := hE.unique_up_to_iso hG
  let TX : «expr ≅ » E.X G.X := (cocones.forget _).map_iso T
  apply_fun TX.hom
  swap;
  · suffices function.bijective TX.hom by exact this.1
    rw [← is_iso_iff_bijective]
    apply is_iso.of_iso
  change («expr ≫ » (E.ι.app i) TX.hom) x = («expr ≫ » (E.ι.app j) TX.hom) y
  erw [T.hom.w, T.hom.w]
  obtain ⟨k, f, g, h⟩ := h
  have : G.ι.app i x = (G.ι.app k (F.map f x) : G.X) := quot.sound ⟨f, rfl⟩
  rw [this, h]
  symm
  exact quot.sound ⟨g, rfl⟩
#align concrete.is_colimit_rep_eq_of_exists concrete.is_colimit_rep_eq_of_exists
is_colimit_rep_eq_iff_exists:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.is_colimit_rep_eq_iff_exists {D : cocone F} {i j : J} (hD : is_colimit D) (x : F.obj i) (y : F.obj j) :
    D.ι.app i x = D.ι.app j y ↔ ∃ (k : _)(f : «expr ⟶ » i k)(g : «expr ⟶ » j k), F.map f x = F.map g y :=
  ⟨concrete.is_colimit_exists_of_rep_eq _ hD _ _, concrete.is_colimit_rep_eq_of_exists _ hD _ _⟩
#align concrete.is_colimit_rep_eq_iff_exists concrete.is_colimit_rep_eq_iff_exists
is_colimit_exists_rep:
theorem concrete.is_colimit_exists_rep {D : cocone F} (hD : is_colimit D) (x : D.X) :
    ∃ (j : J)(y : F.obj j), D.ι.app j y = x :=
  by
  obtain ⟨a, rfl⟩ := concrete.from_union_surjective_of_is_colimit F hD x
  exact ⟨a.1, a.2, rfl⟩
#align concrete.is_colimit_exists_rep concrete.is_colimit_exists_rep
is_colimit_exists_of_rep_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr𝟙» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.is_colimit_exists_of_rep_eq {D : cocone F} {i j : J} (hD : is_colimit D) (x : F.obj i) (y : F.obj j)
    (h : D.ι.app _ x = D.ι.app _ y) : ∃ (k : _)(f : «expr ⟶ » i k)(g : «expr ⟶ » j k), F.map f x = F.map g y :=
  by
  let E := (forget C).map_cocone D
  let hE : is_colimit E := is_colimit_of_preserves _ hD
  let G := types.colimit_cocone.{v, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))
  let hG := types.colimit_cocone_is_colimit.{v, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))
  let T : «expr ≅ » E G := hE.unique_up_to_iso hG
  let TX : «expr ≅ » E.X G.X := (cocones.forget _).map_iso T
  apply_fun TX.hom  at h
  change («expr ≫ » (E.ι.app i) TX.hom) x = («expr ≫ » (E.ι.app j) TX.hom) y at h
  erw [T.hom.w, T.hom.w] at h
  replace h := Quot.exact _ h
  suffices
    ∀ (a b : Σj, F.obj j) (h : EqvGen (limits.types.quot.rel.{v, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))) a b),
      ∃ (k : _)(f : «expr ⟶ » a.1 k)(g : «expr ⟶ » b.1 k), F.map f a.2 = F.map g b.2
    by exact this ⟨i, x⟩ ⟨j, y⟩ h
  intro a b h
  induction h
  case rel x y hh =>
    obtain ⟨e, he⟩ := hh
    use y.1, e, («expr𝟙») _
    simpa using he.symm
  case refl x => use x.1, («expr𝟙») _, («expr𝟙») _, rfl
  case symm x y _ hh =>
    obtain ⟨k, f, g, hh⟩ := hh
    use k, g, f, hh.symm
  case trans x y z _ _ hh1 hh2 =>
    obtain ⟨k1, f1, g1, h1⟩ := hh1
    obtain ⟨k2, f2, g2, h2⟩ := hh2
    let k0 : J := is_filtered.max k1 k2
    let e1 : «expr ⟶ » k1 k0 := is_filtered.left_to_max _ _
    let e2 : «expr ⟶ » k2 k0 := is_filtered.right_to_max _ _
    let k : J := is_filtered.coeq («expr ≫ » g1 e1) («expr ≫ » f2 e2)
    let e : «expr ⟶ » k0 k := is_filtered.coeq_hom _ _
    use k, «expr ≫ » f1 («expr ≫ » e1 e), «expr ≫ » g2 («expr ≫ » e2 e)
    simp only [F.map_comp, comp_apply, h1, ← h2]
    simp only [← comp_apply, ← F.map_comp]
    rw [is_filtered.coeq_condition]
#align concrete.is_colimit_exists_of_rep_eq concrete.is_colimit_exists_of_rep_eq
from_union_surjective_of_is_colimit:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⋙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≅ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≫ » -/
theorem concrete.from_union_surjective_of_is_colimit {D : cocone F} (hD : is_colimit D) :
    let ff : (Σj : J, F.obj j) → D.X := fun a => D.ι.app a.1 a.2
    function.surjective ff :=
  by
  intro ff
  let E := (forget C).map_cocone D
  let hE : is_colimit E := is_colimit_of_preserves _ hD
  let G := types.colimit_cocone.{v, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))
  let hG := types.colimit_cocone_is_colimit.{v, v} («expr ⋙ » F (forget C))
  let T : «expr ≅ » E G := hE.unique_up_to_iso hG
  let TX : «expr ≅ » E.X G.X := (cocones.forget _).map_iso T
  suffices function.surjective (TX.hom ∘ ff) by
    intro a
    obtain ⟨b, hb⟩ := this (TX.hom a)
    refine' ⟨b, _⟩
    apply_fun TX.inv  at hb
    change («expr ≫ » TX.hom TX.inv) (ff b) = («expr ≫ » TX.hom TX.inv) _ at hb
    simpa only [TX.hom_inv_id] using hb
  have : TX.hom ∘ ff = fun a => G.ι.app a.1 a.2 := by
    ext a
    change («expr ≫ » (E.ι.app a.1) (hE.desc G)) a.2 = _
    rw [hE.fac]
  rw [this]
  rintro ⟨⟨j, a⟩⟩
  exact ⟨⟨j, a⟩, rfl⟩
#align concrete.from_union_surjective_of_is_colimit concrete.from_union_surjective_of_is_colimit
colimit_rep_eq_of_exists:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.colimit_rep_eq_of_exists [has_colimit F] {i j : J} (x : F.obj i) (y : F.obj j)
    (h : ∃ (k : _)(f : «expr ⟶ » i k)(g : «expr ⟶ » j k), F.map f x = F.map g y) : colimit.ι F i x = colimit.ι F j y :=
  concrete.is_colimit_rep_eq_of_exists F (colimit.is_colimit _) x y h
#align concrete.colimit_rep_eq_of_exists concrete.colimit_rep_eq_of_exists
colimit_rep_eq_iff_exists:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.colimit_rep_eq_iff_exists [has_colimit F] {i j : J} (x : F.obj i) (y : F.obj j) :
    colimit.ι F i x = colimit.ι F j y ↔ ∃ (k : _)(f : «expr ⟶ » i k)(g : «expr ⟶ » j k), F.map f x = F.map g y :=
  ⟨concrete.colimit_exists_of_rep_eq _ _ _, concrete.colimit_rep_eq_of_exists _ _ _⟩
#align concrete.colimit_rep_eq_iff_exists concrete.colimit_rep_eq_iff_exists
colimit_exists_rep:
theorem concrete.colimit_exists_rep [has_colimit F] (x : colimit F) : ∃ (j : J)(y : F.obj j), colimit.ι F j y = x :=
  concrete.is_colimit_exists_rep F (colimit.is_colimit _) x
#align concrete.colimit_exists_rep concrete.colimit_exists_rep
colimit_exists_of_rep_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
theorem concrete.colimit_exists_of_rep_eq [has_colimit F] {i j : J} (x : F.obj i) (y : F.obj j)
    (h : colimit.ι F _ x = colimit.ι F _ y) : ∃ (k : _)(f : «expr ⟶ » i k)(g : «expr ⟶ » j k), F.map f x = F.map g y :=
  concrete.is_colimit_exists_of_rep_eq F (colimit.is_colimit _) x y h
#align concrete.colimit_exists_of_rep_eq concrete.colimit_exists_of_rep_eq
cokernel_funext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⟶ » -/
-- TODO: Add analogous lemmas about products and equalizers.
-- We don't mark this as an `@[ext]` lemma as we don't always want to work elementwise.
theorem cokernel_funext {C : Type _} [Category C] [has_zero_morphisms C] [concrete_category C] {M N K : C}
    {f : «expr ⟶ » M N} [has_cokernel f] {g h : «expr ⟶ » (cokernel f) K}
    (w : ∀ n : N, g (cokernel.π f n) = h (cokernel.π f n)) : g = h :=
  by
  apply coequalizer.hom_ext
  apply concrete_category.hom_ext _ _
  simpa using w
#align cokernel_funext cokernel_funext
